tag_list: writer, non-fiction-writer, author, speaker, inspirational-speaker, motivational-speaker, column, christian
overview:
Janice F. Baca is a published author, beloved writer as well as a Baccalaureate Registered Nurse who recently served over 9 years as an officer in the US Air Force.

Janice’s experience around the world and her passion to write has awarded her an opportunity to write columns for women, publish poetry, and her book on healing spiritual and emotional wounded will be out on the market in January 2011. Her didactic, or workbook, will be on the market later in 2011.

Her drive to seek facts and provide self-help and spiritual help has received recognition from churches such as the large church in the world in South Korea as well as men and women who are seeking self-help articles in emotional and spiritual growth. She is currently pursuing her Master’s of Theology Degree which demands continued growth and demands for excellence in writing.

Janice’s passion for writing doesn’t stop there… she is an astounding inspirational speaker! Your life would forever be changed after her encouragement and direction.
